name: Create a new alert with priority and assigned responsible party
scenarioId: 02_AlertsManagement:Create a new alert with priority and assigned responsible party
methodName: Create a new alert with priority and assigned responsible party

testSteps.description: Given I am on the Operators login page.

children.description: Junior opens the browser at http://localhost:3000

testSteps.description: When the operator creates a new alert

children.description: Junior clicks on Enter Add Item Button

testSteps.description: And assigns a priority level to the alert
